snippet: Gov. Maggie Hassan, a Democrat, will not seek a third term and cast herself as a Washington outsider in challenging Senator Kelly Ayotte, a Republican, in what figures to be a much-watched race nationwide.
abstract: Gov. Maggie Hassan, a Democrat, will not seek a third term and cast herself as a Washington outsider in challenging Senator Kelly Ayotte, a Republican, in what figures to be a much-watched race nationwide.

headline.main: New Hampshire’s Governor Jumps Into the Race for Senate
